Package ch.rabanti.picoxlsx4j.style

Class StyleManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.rabanti.picoxlsx4j.style.StyleManager
  • public class StyleManager
extends Object
    Class representing a style manager to maintain all styles and its components of a workbook
    Author:
    Raphael Stockeli
